page.title: 19<<<< EDUCATION >>>>
page.content: In MALPAS most children pass through 3 types of education organised on a formal basis. STAGE 1. The PLAYGROUP Children go to playgroup between the ages of 3 and 5. this is a place where children can learn to socialise with other children of the same age before they go to school. Formal learning as such is not established children are encouraged to play, paint and mix with their peer group. In Malpas there are 2 playgroups. STAGE 2. PRIMARY SCHOOL age range 5 to 11 years. Children enter the state system which is free or attend private school which has to be paid for by parents. Most children enter the state system. STAGE 3 COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL age range 11 to 18+ Then on to COLLEGE,UNIVERSITY or into work.
